</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The enemy [[Side|side]] (used for renegades). Unit of this side is enemy to everyone.
<br>To become one, you can attack members of your own side or use [[addRating]].
<br>When below a [[rating]] of -2000 units switch automatically to this side. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sideEnemy''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[side]] [[player]] == [[sideEnemy]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "We've got a renegade!";
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addRating]], [[rating]], [[Side]], [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideLogic]], [[sideFriendly]], [[sideUnknown]], [[playerSide]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[Side relations]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
